comments.body:
@pofider 
I'm not sure if that is a proper way to reflect the module contrat, can you check this?
https://github.com/jsreport/jsreport/blob/master/index.js#L62-L75
(IMO module exports its own function and re-exports other types)

Thank you for reviewing. 
We were planning to remove the other exports in the next major, so I was thinking there is no point in adding types now.
I just wanted to re-export the types that are exported in [jsreport-core](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/jsreport-core/index.d.ts) package. 
If it's an internal rule of the repository to cover all exports, I can add it temporarily for now. Please let me know.

> If it's an internal rule of the repository to cover all exports, I can add it temporarily for now

Nope, only for a concern of providing same experience for users and reflecting the native module properly (in short, stick with the goal of the DT repo: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/README.md#L3).
I see the point. Also you own both implementations, so it's up to you (and for DT maintainer for final touch).
